actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1589.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 3816 to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to expedite the enforcement of Federal Trade Commission cease and desist orders and compulsory process orders; to increase the independence of the Federal Trade Commission in legislative, budgetary, and personnel matters; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 3816 (Amending the Federal Trade Commission Act).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 3816 to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to expedite the enforcement of Federal Trade Commission cease and desist orders and compulsory process orders; to increase the independence of the Federal Trade Commission in legislative, budgetary, and personnel matters; and for other purposes.
